Module org.example
Package org.example.connection

Class Connect

java.lang.Object
org.example.connection.Connect
public class Connect extends Object
The Connect class is responsible for managing the database connection and provides methods for database operations.

      name - the user's name
      surname - the user's surname
      login - the user's login
      email - the user's email
      password - the user's password
      date - the user's date of birth
      avatar - the user's avatar
      Returns:
      the SQL query for registering a new user
